GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBlanketDescription.English: An improvised blanket sewn together from scraps of cloth. Will keep you a little warmer on those cold, winter nights.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBlanketDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una manta improvisada, cosida con pedazos de tela. Te mantendrá algo más caliente en esas frías noches de invierno.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBlanketDescription.Turkish: Kumaş parçalarından birbirine dikilmiş doğaçlama bir battaniye. Bu soğuk kış gecelerinde içinizi biraz daha ısıtacak.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBlanketDescription.Russian: Импровизированное одеяло, сшитое из лоскутков ткани. Сохранит ваше тепло в эти холодные зимние ночи.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBlanketDescription.Italian: Una coperta improvvisata cucita da pezzi di stoffa. Ti terrà un po' al caldo in queste fredde notti invernali.

GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBedrollDescription.English: An improvised bedroll sewn together from scraps of cloth. Should keep you warm enough.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBedrollDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un saco de dormir improvisado, cosido con pedazos de tela. Debería mantenerte caliente, más o menos.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBedrollDescription.Turkish: Kumaş parçalarından birbirine dikilmiş doğaçlama bir uyku tulumu. Seni yeterince sıcak tutmalı.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBedrollDescription.Russian: Импровизированный спальник, сшитый из лоскутков ткани. Может помочь сохранить тепло.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBedrollDescription.Italian: Un sacco a pelo improvvisato cucito da pezzi di stoffa. Dovrebbe tenerti abbastanza al caldo.

GAMEPLAY_OldBlanketDescription.English: An old and dusty wool blanket. Abandoned, but still soft to the touch. Will keep you warmer on those cold, winter nights.
GAMEPLAY_OldBlanketDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una vieja y polvorienta manta de lana. Abandonada, pero aún es suave al tacto. Te mantendrá más caliente en esas frías noches de invierno.
GAMEPLAY_OldBlanketDescription.Turkish: Eski ve tozlu bir yün battaniye. Terk edilmiş ama yine de yumuşak. O soğuk kış gecelerinde içinizi ısıtacak.
GAMEPLAY_OldBlanketDescription.Russian: Старое и пыльное шерстяное одеяло. Брошенное, но всё еще мягкое на ощупь. Сохранит ваше тепло в эти холодные зимние ночи.
GAMEPLAY_OldBlanketDescription.Italian: Una coperta in lana vecchia e polverosa. Abbandonata, ma ancora morbida al tocco. Ti terrà al caldo in queste fredde notti invernali.
